quote: Humans have come into being for the sake of each other, so either teach them or learn to bear them.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Don't explain your philosophy. Embody it.
author: Epictetus

quote: The best revenge is not to be like your enemy.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: If it's endurable, then endure it. Stop complaining.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Live your whole life invested by outside forces and with a wholly joyful heart.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: The greater the difficulty, the more glory in surmounting it. Skillful pilots gain their reputation from storms and tempests.
author: Epictetus

quote: Accept whatever comes to you woven in the pattern of your destiny, for what could more aptly fit your needs.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: If someone succeeds in provoking you, realize that your mind is complicit in the provocation.
author: Epictetus

quote: You don't have to turn this into something. It doesn't have to upset you.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: If you are distressed by anything external, the pain is not due to the thing itself, but to your opinion of it; and this you have the power to revoke at any moment.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Devote the rest of your life to making progress.
author: Seneca

quote: True happiness is to be present, without anxious dependence on the future.
author: Seneca

quote: Let us prepare our minds as if we'd come to the end of life. Let us postpone nothing.
author: Seneca

quote: Get back up when you fail. Celebrate behaving like a human.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: If a man knows not to which port he sails, no wind is favourable.
author: Seneca

quote: Love the hand that fate deals you and play it as your own. Amor Fati
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Society tames the wolf into a dog. And man is the most domesticated animal after all.
author: Nietzsche

quote: Do not be wise in words, be wise in deeds.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: He who is unable to live in society, or who has no need because he is sufficient for himself, just be either a beast or a god.
author: Aristotle

quote: The world will ask who you are, and if you don't know, the world will tell you.
author: Carl Jung

quote: Men speak opinions, not facts. Our eyes see perspective, not truth.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Happy is the man who can make others better, not only when he is in their company, but even when he is in their thoughts!
author: Seneca

quote: A gem cannot be polished without friction, nor a man perfected without trials.
author: Seneca

quote: Control your anger, if you hold anger towards others, they have control over you.
author: Miyamoto Musashi

quote: If you feel like losing everything, remember trees lose their leaves every year. Yet they stand so tall and wait for better days to come.
author: Japanese saying

quote: The cave you fear to enter holds the treasure you seek.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: If you spend your time chasing butterflies, they'll fly away. But if you spend your time building a garden, the butterflies will come.
author: Unknown

quote: Let us conduct ourselves so that all men want to be our friends, and all fear to be our enemies.
author: Alexander the Great

quote: One day your life will flash before your eyes. Make sure it's worth watching.
author: Gerard Way

quote: You always own the option of having no opinion.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Learn to be patient with those who err. Remember that no one is perfect and it is through this understanding that we can find peace.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: We don't rise to the levels of our expectations, we fall to the level of our training.
author: Archilocus

quote: We suffer more in imagination than in reality.
author: Seneca

quote: The things you think about determine the quality of your mind. Your soul takes on the color of your thoughts.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: You could leave this life right now. Let that determine what you do and say and think.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Begin at once to live, and count each separate day as a separate life.
author: Seneca

quote: You don't have to turn this into something. It doesn't have to upset you.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: The trials you have will introduce you to your strengths.
author: Epictetus

quote: Someone despises me. That's their problem.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Waste no more time arguing what a good man should be. Be one.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Your days are numbered. Use them to throw open the windows of your soul to the sun. If you don't, the sun will set and you will set with it.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: First say to yourself what you would be; and then do what you have to do.
author: Epictetus

quote: Choose not to be harmed, and you won't feel harmed. Don't feel harmed, and you haven't been
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: You become what you give your attention to
author: Epictetus

quote: It is impossible to learn that which you think you already know.
author: Epictetus
